mpriest.name: Monster Hunter Priest
mpriest.explanation: A set for a noble priest who serves our realm!

mmerchant.name: Monster Hunter Merchant
mmerchant.explanation: A set for a noble merchant who has some friends that serve our realm!

mmage.name: Monster Hunter Mage
mmage.explanation: A set for a noble mage who serves our realm!

mwarrior.name: Monster Hunter Warrior
mwarrior.explanation: A set for a noble warrior who serves our realm!

rugged.name: Rugged Set
rugged.explanation: Just the right amount of protection for the agile wearer

mranger.name: Monster Hunter Ranger
mranger.explanation: A set for a noble ranger who serves our realm!

wanderers.name: Wanderer's Set
wanderers.explanation: Wanderer was a curious adventurer. Traveling from place to place. The items he left over make up a very lucky set when they are combined.

mrogue.name: Monster Hunter Rogue
mrogue.explanation: A set for a noble rogue who serves our realm!
